src:
Quienes contaban con Seguro Popular serán atendidos por Instituto de Bienestar para la Salud: AMLO | Entérate
07 Nov 2019, 10:10 by Redacción AN / AL



El presidente AMLO dijo que los beneficiarios del Seguro Popular ahora serán atendidos por el recién creado Instituto de Bienestar para la Salud, por lo que descartó que exista desabasto de medicamentos o que se vaya a dejar de atender a la población beneficiaria de dicho programa.
text:
Those who had Popular Insurance will be treated by the Institute of Health Welfare: AMLO | Find out
07 Nov 2019, 10:10 by AN / AL Writing



President AMLO said that the beneficiaries of Popular Insurance will now be taken care of by the newly created Institute of Health Welfare, so he ruled out that there is a shortage of medicines or that the beneficiary population of said program will be stopped.
